explains: adj. 多刺的，带刺的；棘手的，麻烦的

sentences.en: At the same time, the policy addresses none of the truly thorny questions about homework.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，该政策并没有解决关于家庭作业的真正棘手的问题。

sentences.en: Military presence and its impact on Japanese residents have been a thorny issue over the years.
sentences.cn: 多年来，军事存在及其对日本居民的影响一直是一个棘手的问题。

sentences.en: Such scenarios raise thorny issues about the rights of parents and the meaning of individuality.
sentences.cn: 这些情况引发了有关父母权利和个性意义的棘手问题。
